name: You
text: Phew! That was so scary. I don't want to do it again

name: Mom
text: Is there anyone that got injured?

name: Dad
text: Fortunately, none of us are injured.

name: Sister
text: Is it okay now onii-chan? Is it?

name: You
text: We don't know if there more of those creatures lying around so I suggest we pick up the pace.

name: Narrator
text: After having a fierce battle with the mutated creature called Livid, they have sucessfully secured the safe/bunker.

name: Narrator
text: Will they be able to continue living in peace in this bunker? Or will they be pestered further by these infected creatures.
